column1: Read more about my longstanding opposition to war with Iran. #NoWarWithIran https://t.co/Yck3CYCsmq

Thank you to the @StonewallAustin  for your endorsement. I salute your important work to advance equal rights for LGBTQIA people and will continue to advocate for you in Congress. https://t.co/zSNpkurDzz
Pleased to receive the unanimous endorsement of @capd_atx who have long championed our shared values and support progressive Democrats up and down the ballot. https://t.co/g9hUzmf2PO

As part of their new year's resolution many include "exercising." This should include exercising our right to vote and increasing civic participation to build a democracy that better reflects our values.

If you are looking for a recipe on how to turn TX blue look no further than the @blueactiondems .  The innovation passion & hard work of @BlueActionSWATX in 2018 helped register numerous new voters raised thousands of dollars and increased turnout to successfully elect Dems. https://t.co/SVchPo0Mgx
A Merry Christmas from my family to yours!
ICYMI: I voted yes on impeachment as the House did its solemn duty to safeguard our Constitution in the face of President Trump's abuse of power and obstruction. https://t.co/HB9XF5BjLK

Good friends food and fellowship at the @BADATXDemocrats holiday party. New officers Jamarr Brown and Shellie Hayes-McMahon awarded community leaders including teen entrepreneur Mikaila Ulmer and Shellie for her work at @AnniesListTX  to elect more Democratic women in Texas. https://t.co/4TP1rRyG3O
Tomorrow I will vote to impeach President Trump. This is not a "whodunnit” as Trump readily admitted his own misconduct. https://t.co/yceIupgLd0

Pleased that the physicians in our family - Lisa and Don - could join others concerned with health care in support of State Rep. Erin Zwiener.  Her reelection in one of our most vigorously contested CenTex races is so important to health care and the future of our State. https://t.co/wqloVylF86
Honored to receive the unanimous endorsement of @UDems for reelection to Congress. I appreciate this strong vote of confidence from our next generation of Democratic leaders. https://t.co/y6EdxtuKnJ
Thanks Becky! Always great to see you. https://t.co/BzRG40a6vj

Representing our shared values in Congress at this most challenging time I have filed for reelection with the support of so many San Antonio leaders. https://t.co/TQeqyDpj8f

It's a sign of the times! Soon I will file for re-election to continue representing neighborhoods from South San Antonio to North Austin. My signs are going up and with your support next November we have the opportunity to take back our democracy. https://t.co/nMI9f0jinr

With AFSCME Local 1624 to and share an update on impeachment proceedings. Celebrated an exciting new chapter in expanding housing affordability opening Pathways at Chalmers Courts South & breaking ground on the next phase across the street! More on this effort here: https://t.co/OoSprdmcCm

Supporting three of my first term House colleagues - @XochforCongress @HornForCongress and @Lizzie4Congress  - along with @GinaOrtizJones  running in Texas' 23rd Congressional District which stretches from San Antonio to El Paso. https://t.co/xtKxTExKjp

This President has come to believe that he can get away with anything when it comes to trampling our democracy. It is important that we in Congress exercise in a responsible way our duty to protect our Constitution.
I believe we should promptly consider specific articles of impeachment concerning President Trump's misconduct. https://t.co/Y0DrrmOqn8

On #NationalVoterRegistrationDay make sure you're registered to vote at your current address at https://t.co/NGu7dZKFXK! Victory in 2020 from the courthouse to the White House depends on exercising your right to vote. Let today be a reminder of how important it is to register.
Trump would know especially since Campaign Chair and San Antonian Brad Parscale proclaims a "Trump Dynasty" ahead. https://t.co/IMb05blKW2

From now until the presidential election we must push back every day in every reasonable way. We have to encourage our friends families and neighbors to get involved register to vote and engage with the government at all levels.

With the Senate under GOP control & the President wildly out of control our work remains very challenging. Together we are rising to the challenge. I am reinvigorated every day by the individuals who shared their priorities with me at one of my town halls or community events.
On my website you can request a yard sign if you live in the district once they become available or authorize the use of your good name on one of my local endorsement committees.

Have you seen my new website? Stay engaged with my campaign and help move our country forward & ensure victory up & down the 2020 ballot — from the courthouse to the White House. Next November we have a chance to take back our democracy & send reinforcements to Congress with me. https://t.co/Sg1dCyLJbN
Public servants unafraid of accountability make it easier to vote not harder. Shamefully Texas Republicans are slashing the number of polling stations. https://t.co/f6BwXHiKIY

We must act now to implement specific science-based policies & join w/ anyone willing to work together on practical climate solutions. It's up to each of us to vote for candidates committed to protecting our natural resources & encourage our friends and neighbors to do the same.

The Green New Deal will require refinement but it represents an important alternative to the same old dirty deal that threatens our planet and with which the only "green" is the color of the dark money polluting our democracy.
